vorstand.name: Jörg Singer
vorstand.beschreibung: Driving force behind the vision to make Helgoland the centre of offshore hydrogen production. Initiator of AquaVentus.

vorstand.name: Dr. Christoph von dem Bussche
vorstand.beschreibung: CEO of GASCADE and responsible for the development of hydrogen transport infrastructure in Germany.

vorstand.name: Dr. Kirsten Westphal
vorstand.beschreibung: Member of the BDEW executive board and the National Hydrogen Council. Brings energy and geopolitical expertise.

vorstand.name: Robert Eschenauer
vorstand.beschreibung: Heads the product management for electrolysers at Bosch and represents the industrial technology perspective.

vorstand.name: Martin Neubert
vorstand.beschreibung: Brings an international investor perspective and experience in the development of large-scale infrastructure projects.

vorstand.name: Kay Martens
vorstand.beschreibung: Managing Director of Versorgungsbetriebe Helgoland. Responsible for the financial strategy of the association.
